channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Abandoned waste bin, 28th June
item.description:
This bin has no lid and doesn’t appear to be owned by anyone. It’s been loose in the street for some weeks. Is being used and frequently smells, particularly during this hot weather. Can your please remove it ?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crouch Hall Road, Crouch End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped barbecue briquettes, 28th June
item.description:

item.title: Burnt tissue been thrown into garden, 28th June
item.description:
Hi, We live in 24A Glenarm Road and someone has littered in our garden with burn tissue as you can see in the photos it has landed on woody plants which would have been a major problem as they could have caught fire.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Glenarm Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Hole in pavement tarmac near a drain cover., 28th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tyler Street, East Greenwich, London
